plot: This time, three powerful cars--Audi RS6, Mercedes-Benz E55 AMG, and Maserati Coupé--as well as five agile super-minis, are put to the test. A Lada Riva gets an extreme makeover, as the Irish actor, Michael Gambon, is the next star.

Jeremy test drives the Maserati 3200GT, which The Stig takes on a lap of the test track. Richard checks out the Ford Fiesta, Citroën C3, Honda Jazz, Nissan Micra and MG ZR in his search for the best super-mini. Some white van men drive a Ford World Rally Transit van around the track. The team challenge Lotus to modify a Lada Riva into a track car. Michael Gambon is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots

This time, there's a battle between the powerful, Audi RS6; the fast, Mercedes-Benz E55 AMG, and the Italian grand tourer, Maserati Coupé. The agile super-minis--Ford Fiesta, Honda Jazz, Nissan Micra, Citroën C3, and the hot-hatch, MG ZR--are put to the test, as Richard sets out to find Britain's fastest white van driver in a Ford World Rally Transit van. In the meantime, a humble Lada Riva gets an extreme makeover, as the experienced team of Lotus transforms it into a beast. Lastly, the Irish actor, Michael Gambon, is the next star in a reasonably-priced car.—Nick Riganas
